maintainers.name: Dave Sudia
maintainers.bio: I'm a career-changer from education, and I used Exercism to reinforce my skills as I made the switch. I love TypeScript for the flexibility of JS with the consistency of strongly typed languages. Maintaining the TS track has grown my appreciation for the language.

maintainers.name: Cristian Rivas GÃ³mez
maintainers.bio: I am a Software Engineering student from San Sebastian. I enjoy a lot reading about topics related to Java, software maintainability and web technologies. My love for TypeScript began developing web apps with Angular framework.

maintainers.name: Derk-Jan Karrenbeld
maintainers.bio: All-round programmer, manager and owner of a Dutch software agency specializing in bespoke and tailored code.
